column7: Problem: Belt tension too tight on some machines (16” Cast base comparator – BTCOMP2) in the Y axis drive train.  Cause – Tolerance stack up  Solution: Drive belt will be extended to accommodate a larger center line distance between the two pulleys. The belt has an upper and lower tensioning member to take up the slack so there is no concern regarding the extra added pitch length of the belt.
